sentences: Hearts & Colors is a singer-songwriter duo from Gothenburg, Sweden, consisting of Philip Tillstr√∂m & Nicolai Kjellberg.
The band formed in 2014, and started off as an indie-folk duo, covering artists like One Direction and Bruno Mars on YouTube.
The band has released four songs: "Too Many Friends" in February 2018, and "Lying to Myself" and "Waterbed" simultaneously in June of the same year.
Their fourth song "LA On A Saturday Night" was released in October 2018.
